mapper.sql: material_id, material_code, material_name, specifications, material_describe, material_group_id, material_classify_id, status, ABC_logo, material_num, material_texture, measuring_unit, supplier_id, wind_id, is_guarantee, guarantee_days, is_con_stock, max_stock, min_stock, is_batch_con, safety_stock, current_stock, average_price, is_delete, creater, create_time, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4
mapper.select:
select a.material_id,a.material_code,a.material_name,a.specifications,a.material_describe,a.measuring_unit,c.classify_name from material a left join material_group b on a.material_group_id=b.material_group_id left join material_classify c on a.material_classify_id = c.material_classify_id left join supplier d on a.supplier_id = d.supplier_id left join wind_field e on a.wind_id = e.wind_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select a.*,b.group_name,c.classify_name,d.supplier_name,e.wind_name from material a left join material_group b on a.material_group_id=b.material_group_id left join material_classify c on a.material_classify_id = c.material_classify_id left join supplier d on a.supplier_id = d.supplier_id left join wind_field e on a.wind_id = e.wind_id where a.material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into material (material_id, material_code, material_name, specifications, material_describe, material_group_id, material_classify_id, status, ABC_logo, material_num, material_texture, measuring_unit, supplier_id, wind_id, is_guarantee, guarantee_days, is_con_stock, max_stock, min_stock, is_batch_con, safety_stock, current_stock, average_price, is_delete, creater, create_time, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4 ) values (#{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialClassifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abcLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialTexture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measuringUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{windId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isGuarantee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guaranteeDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isConStock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isBatchCon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safetyStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{averagePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{extend1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
